subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
Testosterone
lead_paragraph: The tale behind Lance Armstrong’s first Tour de France triumph in 1999 is laid out in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s report in almost novelistic fashion.
snippet: The tale behind Lance Armstrong’s first Tour de France triumph in 1999 is laid out in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s report in almost novelistic fashion.
